Docs.param: The message to store the data into.
The data to serialize to Avro and encode into the message.
The type to use to serialize the data.
An optional instance to signal the request to cancel the operation.
Docs.summary: Encodes the message data into Avro and stores it in . The will be set to "avro/binary+schemaId" where schemaId is the ID of the schema used to encode the data.
